about.summary: Usability wrapper around snow for easier development of parallel R programs. This package offers e.g. extended error checks, and additional functions. All functions work in sequential mode, too, if no cluster is present or wished. Package is also designed as connector to the cluster management tool sfCluster, but can also used without it.

name: r-snowfall
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.84-6.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-snowfall
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: snowfall_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/snowfall_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/snowfall/snowfall_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5c446df3a931e522a8b138cf1fb7ca5815cc82fcf486dbac964dcbc0690e248d

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1003
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-snow
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-snow

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('snowfall')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('snowfall')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=snowfall
  license: GPL
  summary: Usability wrapper around snow for easier development of parallel R programs. This
    package offers e.g. extended error checks, and additional functions. All functions
    work in sequential mode, too, if no cluster is present or wished. Package is also
    designed as connector to the cluster management tool sfCluster, but can also used
    without it.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
